texture_debug_messages: This function can be used to enable or disable texture debug messages. When enabled (set to <tt>true</tt>), additional information about texture page use will be sent to the output window. Set to <tt>false</tt> to disable this output again.
Enable or disable the texture debug messages
The above code will check the value of a global variable and if it is set to <tt>true</tt> then texture debug messages are enabled.
